Text: Re ISDA Master Agreement between Enron North America Corp and SociieteIndustrielle de Transports Automobile SAThis email and any attachments are confidential and may also be privileged If you are not the named recipient please notify the sender immediately and do not disclose the contents to another person use it for any purpose or store or copy the information in any medium Sharon Lewis asked me to contact you about this Our client has instructed us that it is SITA which will enter into the ISDA master agreement SITA as the main company must have a better credit than the company that you identified We cannot agree to a credit support document We suggest that you evaluate the credit of SITA and then get back to us Kind regards Susan Sharon Thanks for your fax and markup of the Schedule dated Sept There is a major issue which we need to discuss and that is the counterparty identity itself It appears that you have identified a DIFFERENT party to the agreement namely a limited liability company named SITA which is not the entity which we originally proposed This does not appear to be the credit which we evaluated Also we insist upon a Credit Support Annex As you know the agreement contemplates multiple transactions and the posting of collateral is a major issue particularly for longdated pulp deals Can you call me tomorrow We need to address the major issues upfront You can reach me at Thank you Sara Lovells the merged firm of Lovell White Durrant and Boesebeck Droste practising as Lovells Boesebeck Droste in some jurisdictions is an international law firm In the event of any technical difficulty with this email please contact the sender or the London Technology Department on

Re ISDA Master Agreement between Enron North America Corp andSociieteIndustrielle de Transports Automobile SAThis email and any attachments are confidential and may also be privileged If you are not the named recipient please notify the sender immediately and do not disclose the contents to another person use it for any purpose or store or copy the information in any medium Please would you send me your fax number Many thanks Susan Lovells the merged firm of Lovell White Durrant and Boesebeck Droste practising as Lovells Boesebeck Droste in some jurisdictions is an international law firm In the event of any technical difficulty with this email please contact the sender or the London Technology Department on

SITAThis email and any attachments are confidential and may also be privileged If you are not the named recipient please notify the sender immediately and do not disclose the contents to another person use it for any purpose or store or copy the information in any medium Further to my fax of October we have SITAs instructions Credit Support Annex SITAs position is unchanged SITA does not wish to have a Credit Support Annex SITA have asked that ENRON come up with a proposal on the term and volume of the transactions on the basis of no Credit Support Annex SITA does not provide investment services ancillary to its main activities Do you have any news regarding ENRON on this point Kind regards Susan Hopkinson Lovells the merged firm of Lovell White Durrant and Boesebeck Droste practising as Lovells Boesebeck Droste in some jurisdictions is an international law firm In the event of any technical difficulty with this email please contact the sender or the London Technology Department on

Re Sara ShackletonHOUECT is out of the officeThis email and any attachments are confidential and may also be privileged If you are not the named recipient please notify the sender immediately and do not disclose the contents to another person use it for any purpose or store or copy the information in any medium Sara I have tried to send you the attached fax however it is not going through to you so I am attaching it instead by email Do you have another fax number in case this happens again Thanks Susan Lovells the merged firm of Lovell White Durrant and Boesebeck Droste practising as Lovells Boesebeck Droste in some jurisdictions is an international law firm In the event of any technical difficulty with this email please contact the sender or the London Technology Department on Sara Shackleton ENRONvDOC

Re SITA Cc This email and any attachments are confidential and may also be privileged If you are not the named recipient please notify the sender immediately and do not disclose the contents to another person use it for any purpose or store or copy the information in any medium Thanks for your email Sara When would you like to do the conference call next week I cannot do Monday but any other time should be fine Maybe if you give me a couple of times that suit you then I can picko ne I would like my colleague Sharon Lewis to be free as well if possible Susan Susan Sorry for the delay in getting back to you We have agreed to delete the CSA and will return a blackline to you shortly You may recall that SITA expressly requested that theE nron agreement be governed by English law which is why we prepared thisd ocument for execution by our affiliate in London with the jurisdictionl anguage appearing in the prior draft There are still issues posed by your markup and we should be able to schedule a conference call next week Thanks Sara Susan Hopkinson susan o To vellscom cc Subject SITA AM CONFIDENTIALITY This email and any attachments are confidential and may also be privileged If you are not the named recipient please notify the sender immediately and do not disclose the contents to another person use it for any purpose or store or copy the information in any medium Further to my fax of October we have SITAs instructions Credit Support Annex SITAs position is unchanged SITA does not wish to have a Credit Support Annex SITA have asked that ENRON come up with a proposal on the term and volume of the transactions on the basis of no Credit Support Annex SITA does not provide investment services ancillary to its main activities Do you have any news regarding ENRON on this point Kind regards Susan Hopkinson Lovells the merged firm of Lovell White Durrant and Boesebeck Droste practising as Lovells Boesebeck Droste in some jurisdictions is an international lawf irm In the event of any technical difficulty with this email please contact the sender or the London Technology Department on Lovells the merged firm of Lovell White Durrant and Boesebeck Droste practising as Re SITA Notice detailsThis email and any attachments are confidential and may also be privileged If you are not the named recipient please notify the sender immediately and do not disclose the contents to another person use it for any purpose or store or copy the information in any medium Sara As promised here are the SITA notice details No transaction is to be made by electonic means BUT ONLY BY FAX addressed to Mr Philippe DESSAIN Fax number and confirmed in writing All other notices for purpose of Section and should be addressed to SITA rue des Trois Fontanot Nanterre Cedex France Att Mrs Steinmetz Fax and confirm in writing Mrs Steinmetzs telephone number is Philippe Dessains phone number is Tel Thank you for speaking to us yesterday when you were ill I hope you are feeling better Kind regards Susan Lovells the merged firm of Lovell White Durrant and Boesebeck Droste practising as Lovells Boesebeck Droste in some jurisdictions is an international law firm In the event of any technical difficulty with this email please contact the sender or the London Technology Department on

Re Enron Corp guaranty in favor of SITA Cc This email and any attachments are confidential and may also be privileged If you are not the named recipient please notify the sender immediately and do not disclose the contents to another person use it for any purpose or store or copy the information in any medium Sara Thank you for your email Our comments are as follows Thank you We do not understand the difficulty in accepting our Rider A which is a standard provision in a guarantee and one which our client strongly wishes to include Please would you therefore schedule a conference call with your corporate lawyer Clement Abrams to discuss this Please note that Susan is out of the office on Thursday We agree to Business Days We agree to there being no replacement credit support We look forward to hearing from you Kind regards Sharon Lewis and Susan Hopkinson Sharon Susan We will send blackline shortly With respect to your fax of please note the following continuing guaranty is fine Rider A will require further discussion and is not acceptable days is too long and not justifiable but we are agreeable to extend time to Business Days Replacement credit support is not acceptable If yous till wish to pursue unacceptable items please advise and I will try to arrange a call for you and the Enron Corp lawyer Clement Abrams who is currently out of town He returns tomorrow Thanks Sara Lovells the merged firm of Lovell White Durrant and Boesebeck Droste practising as Lovells Boesebeck Droste in some jurisdictions is an international law firm In the event of any technical difficulty with this email please contact the sender or the London Technology Department on

Fwd ISDA contractThis email and any attachments are confidential and may also be privileged If you are not the named recipient please notify the sender immediately and do not disclose the contents to another person use it for any purpose or store or copy the information in any medium Please find attached an email from SITA Is Enron Europe Finance Trading Limited signing on the basis of their authority under the investment services directive Have you any news on the conference call with your corporate lawyer Thanks Susan Lovells the merged firm of Lovell White Durrant and Boesebeck Droste practising as Lovells Boesebeck Droste in some jurisdictions is an international law firm In the event of any technical difficulty with this email please contact the sender or the London Technology Department on Contenttransferencoding base Received from lonntmimlovellwhitedurrantcom by lovellscom Thu Nov Received from lovellwhitedurrantcom unverified by lonntmimlovellwhitedurrantcom Content Technologies SMTPRS with ESMTP id for Thu Nov Received from plutonsitafr by ulnlovellwhitedurrantcom with SMTP id Thu Nov Received by plutonsitafrLotus SMTP MTA v id CD Thu Nov XLotusFromDomain SITA From To cc Susan Hopkinson MessageID Date Thu Nov Subject ISDA contract MimeVersion Contenttype textplain charsetiso ContentDisposition inline Sita is ready now to enter the swap world We would like to sign now Let me know if every thing is ok on your side I met Mr Brucejones pulp and paper division Enron Europe limited He says due to european financial rgulation authority the contract has to be made with Enron EuropeCan you explain and confirm Best regards

Re Enron Corp SITA Cc This email and any attachments are confidential and may also be privileged If you are not the named recipient please notify the sender immediately and do not disclose the contents to another person use it for any purpose or store or copy the information in any medium Please see attached fax Kind regards Sharon Lewis and Susan Hopkinson Lovells the merged firm of Lovell White Durrant and Boesebeck Droste practising as Lovells Boesebeck Droste in some jurisdictions is an international law firm In the event of any technical difficulty with this email please contact the sender or the London Technology Department on

Re SITA Master AgreementThis email and any attachments are confidential and may also be privileged If you are not the named recipient please notify the sender immediately and do not disclose the contents to another person use it for any purpose or store or copy the information in any medium Sara Thanks for your email As regards your points I will let you know once the guarantee is finalised I look forward to receiving the power My client told me this morning that he has an email from one of your commercial people saying that EEFT will be the counterparty and that ECTRIC is no longer involved I had thought that EEFT were simply signing on behalf of ECTRIC and the fact that you are sending me a power suggests to me that this is still the case However given your commercial colleagues email to my client there is still confusion regarding the identity of the counterparty which I would be grateful if you could clarify Thank you Sita has had executed the certificate which refers to two boardr esolutions and a power of attorney I look forward to hearing from you regarding the Tax rep Have a nice break Susan Susan A few items to follow up with I understand that you are finalizing the Enron Corp guaranty with ClementA brams Please let me know when all is agreed and I will arrange with Clem for an executed guaranty Stephanie Panus will fax to you the power of attorney for EEFT to act for ECTRIC The acronyms will be obvious in the fax Euros are fine for Termination and Contractual Currency I am considering your proposed certificate in lieu of a board resolution and checking your tax rep I will be out of the office Dec You can contact Stephanie Panus in my absence Regards Sara Lovells the merged firm of Lovell White Durrant and Boesebeck Droste practising as Lovells Boesebeck Droste in some jurisdictions is an international law firm In the event of any technical difficulty with this email please contact the sender or the London Technology Department on

Re Enron Corp guarantee Cc This email and any attachments are confidential and may also be privileged If you are not the named recipient please notify the sender immediately and do not disclose the contents to another person use it for any purpose or store or copy the information in any medium Clement and Sara Thank you Please would you send me the final version Guarantee and Schedule to the ISDA Master Agreement marked to show changes so that I can approve them Many thanks for your assistance Kind regards Susan Susan As it relates to Rider A Enron Corp can agree to the proposed language Please feel free to give me a call at Regards Clement Lovells the merged firm of Lovell White Durrant and Boesebeck Droste practising as Lovells Boesebeck Droste in some jurisdictions is an international law firm In the event of any technical difficulty with this email please contact the sender or the London Technology Department on

Re Enron Corp guarantee Cc This email and any attachments are confidential and may also be privileged If you are not the named recipient please notify the sender immediately and do not disclose the contents to another person use it for any purpose or store or copy the information in any medium Sita have asked me to let you know that they strongly wish to sign theG uarantee and ISDA Master Agreement before December Please would you therefore send me the marked up version of the Guarantee and ISDA Master Agreement today if possible for my approval Please would you also respond regarding the power of attorney We are concerned that it is not dated that there is no date for the TransactionA rranging Agreement that we do not know whether the Transaction ArrangingA greement is still in force and therefore whether the power of attorney is still in force leaving aside for the moment the fact that the power of attorney is undated There is also no date for the Intra Group Services Agreement and the name of the Director who signed the power of attorney is not indicated Many thanks for your assistance on this matter Susan Lovells the merged firm of Lovell White Durrant and Boesebeck Droste practising as Lovells Boesebeck Droste in some jurisdictions is an international law firm In the event of any technical difficulty with this email please contact the sender or the London Technology Department on

Re SITA Master Agreement Cc This email and any attachments are confidential and may also be privileged If you are not the named recipient please notify the sender immediately and do not disclose the contents to another person use it for any purpose or store or copy the information in any medium Many thanks This has crossed with my latest email to you Kind regards Susan Susan and Sharon Attached for your review is the latest draft of the Master Agreement between SITA and ECTRIC as well as a blackline against the previous version See attached file dctrSITAdocSee attached file DCTRSITA REDDOC Stephanie Panus Lovells the merged firm of Lovell White Durrant and Boesebeck Droste practising as Lovells Boesebeck Droste in some jurisdictions is an international law firm In the event of any technical difficulty with this email please contact the sender or the London Technology Department on

Re SITA Master AgreementThis email and any attachments are confidential and may also be privileged If you are not the named recipient please notify the sender immediately and do not disclose the contents to another person use it for any purpose or store or copy the information in any medium Sara Thanks for your email As regards your points I will let you know once the guarantee is finalised I look forward to receiving the power My client told me this morning that he has an email from one of your commercial people saying that EEFT will be the counterparty and that ECTRIC is no longer involved I had thought that EEFT were simply signing on behalf of ECTRIC and the fact that you are sending me a power suggests to me that this is still the case However given your commercial colleagues email to my client there is still confusion regarding the identity of the counterparty which I would be grateful if you could clarify Thank you Sita has had executed the certificate which refers to two boardr esolutions and a power of attorney I look forward to hearing from you regarding the Tax rep Have a nice break Susan Susan A few items to follow up with I understand that you are finalizing the Enron Corp guaranty with ClementA brams Please let me know when all is agreed and I will arrange with Clem for an executed guaranty Stephanie Panus will fax to you the power of attorney for EEFT to act for ECTRIC The acronyms will be obvious in the fax Euros are fine for Termination and Contractual Currency I am considering your proposed certificate in lieu of a board resolution and checking your tax rep I will be out of the office Dec You can contact Stephanie Panus in my absence Regards Sara Lovells the merged firm of Lovell White Durrant and Boesebeck Droste practising as Lovells Boesebeck Droste in some jurisdictions is an international law firm In the event of any technical difficulty with this email please contact the sender or the London Technology Department on

Re ISDA Master Agreement between Enron North America Corp and SociieteIndustrielle de Transports Automobile SAThis email and any attachments are confidential and may also be privileged If you are not the named recipient please notify the sender immediately and do not disclose the contents to another person use it for any purpose or store or copy the information in any medium Sharon Lewis asked me to contact you about this Our client has instructed us that it is SITA which will enter into the ISDA master agreement SITA as the main company must have a better credit than the company that you identified We cannot agree to a credit support document We suggest that you evaluate the credit of SITA and then get back to us Kind regards Susan Sharon Thanks for your fax and markup of the Schedule dated Sept There is a major issue which we need to discuss and that is the counterparty identity itself It appears that you have identified a DIFFERENT party to the agreement namely a limited liability company named SITA which is not the entity which we originally proposed This does not appear to be the credit which we evaluated Also we insist upon a Credit Support Annex As you know the agreement contemplates multiple transactions and the posting of collateral is a major issue particularly for longdated pulp deals Can you call me tomorrow We need to address the major issues upfront You can reach me at Thank you Sara Lovells the merged firm of Lovell White Durrant and Boesebeck Droste practising as Lovells Boesebeck Droste in some jurisdictions is an international law firm In the event of any technical difficulty with this email please contact the sender or the London Technology Department on
